name: Magic Train Foundation

address: 725, Jyoti Nagar, Near St. Mary's Convent Sr. Sec. School,

briefDescription: MAGIC TRAIN FOUNDATION is a Non Government Organization registered under Indian Trust Act 1882.We are basically a small volunteer group working on the grassroot level in marginalized and vulnerable communities. It is complete self finance iniative by our team members. Our work to organize Awareness and Sensitization Meetings on Tuberculosis in vulnerable communities and Special School facility to the Minority and Dalip family Children.Thanks
